scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm run e2e
scripts.test:accessibility: npm run build && npx tsx test/accessibility-check.ts
scripts.screenshot: npm run build && cypress run --e2e --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/screenshot.cy.js
scripts.build:mobile: npm run build && npm run generate:assets && npx cap sync
scripts.android:dev: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build: npm run build:mobile && npx cap build android
scripts.ios:dev: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:build: npm run build:mobile && npx cap build ios
scripts.ios:run: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target
scripts.ios:ipadA16: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="088DAA2D-0E24-4A7D-8BFF-1C7372FFED9B"
scripts.ios:ipadAir3: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="C2DF60C1-E4FD-4B9F-8023-B27BF4295B34"
scripts.ios:ipadAir11: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="B5CF27C3-506D-4DB1-963F-FE8E10C2DFC4"
scripts.ios:ipadAir13: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="09785FAE-ED9D-4A55-831E-53B844BA9486"
scripts.ios:ipadPro11: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="7A7BC037-94C9-4A57-B17A-4B69A0E9A29C"
scripts.ios:ipadPro13: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="7D528078-7E96-4104-8DE2-EDBC96545DBE"
scripts.ios:ipadMini: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="BC67E2A4-38E5-4DD0-8F8A-BD05DF038076"
scripts.ios:iphone13Mini: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="1D9323A4-D5B5-4709-AE4E-90820CF7523A"
scripts.ios:iphone16e: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="234124C2-9926-40F0-83DB-971B7382B884"
scripts.ios:iphone17: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="6E0EAB2B-2587-406F-9033-FD9D5AC51114"
scripts.ios:iphone17Pro: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="53EE584B-475E-4C73-A9D6-D2BC7C9397EB"
scripts.ios:iphone17ProMax: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="8985F7BF-92A1-4379-A360-6FBE13322081"
scripts.ios:iphoneAir: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios --target="012F2745-D363-40CB-992E-10A1452983E1"
scripts.app-store:sync:download: source .env && cd ios && fastlane deliver download_metadata --username "$APPLE_ID" --app_identifier "com.dled.stringhomeworktutor"
